label: A3B_oP16_62_3c_c-002
title: NH$_{4}$I$_{3}$ (D0$_{16}$) Structure
comments:
(Cheesman, 1970) gives the positions of the atoms in Cartesian coordinates, which we have transleted into the standard Wyckoff notation. 
 The hydrogen positions are not given, so the NH$_{4}$ molecules are centered on the $(4c)$ Wyckoff position. 
 With the NH$_{4}$ molecules treated as a single entity, NH$_{4}$I$_{3}$ has the same AFLOW label, A3B\_oP16\_62\_3c\_c, as \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B_oP16_62_3c_c-003}{Bi$_{3}$Ni}. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
